content: We haven't updated the logs or the crates of the tool for a long time now. Mainly, because we didn't integrate it in our usual workflow, yet.
hm why do you want to update the crates?

hm why do you want to update the crates?

I wanted to send pr to cargo based on my experimental lint, until I found it's out of date.
The cargo project does not really care about clippy lints https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/blob/01ddc251e5483e9b1ff8cf3bce968c51e65c9fa8/src/cargo/lib.rs#L7
Oh cargo uses exactly 2 lints from Clippy by the looks of it. We might want to convince them, that Clippy isn't as bad as they think :sweat_smile:
